job_details.degree_required: Associate’s Degree and four years of project management experience

jd: From: Pavan Kumar, WISEEQUATION SOLUTION INC. pavan.k@wiseq.net Reply to: pavan.k@wiseq.net Hi,I am Pavan Kumar and I work as a Sr. IT Technical at Wise Equation Solution Inc. I saw your profile on the Job Board and I was really impressed by your experience.Role: Project Manager Worksite Address: Indianapolis IN 46204 - Hybrid- Locals OnlyDuration: 8 + MonthsInterview type: Webcam onlyJob Summary:Senior PM will support an enterprise-level Windows Server 2016 upgrade initiative.Job Description:General Responsibilities:Responsible for relationship management, project planning, resource management, tactical execution, and the creation and / or oversight of final project deliverablesCollaborate with senior management, stakeholders, and the team to meet business objectives and provide professional leadership & mentorship fostering respect and trust to inspire others to pursue excellence.Review, revise, and implement policies, practices, standards, and tools that support IOT project effortsWork directly with senior managers and staff supporting all facets of IOT’s service deliveryManage staff and teams, as neededJob Requirements:5 years Project management experience OR Associate’s Degree and four years of project management experience.Certification as a Project Management Professional by the Project Management Institute or similar professional designation preferred.Extensive experience overseeing multiple projects to successful conclusionExperience with technology projects using various development methodologies, including agile and waterfall SDLCsAbility to manage projects of relative high complexity and dollar valueDemonstrated capacity to maintain tact, diplomacy, and mindfulness in engagement with highly visible and highly demanding stakeholders at a variety of levelsStrong knowledge of, and documented experience with, exceptional delivery of products and services to a wide range of users, with an emphasis on (but not restricted to) successful delivery in one or more level of governmentAbility to handle multiple high-visibility, high-priority initiatives effectively, independently, and under competing constraintsExceptional professional presence, including the strong ability to communicate publicly to a variety of audiencesDevelop, monitor, and maintain project plansAbility to establish and manage project budget with the understanding of all financial implications/issuesCoordinate and monitor activities of all stakeholders to ensure timelines and budgets are metCommunicate project status to management and project stakeholdersAble to perform more varied and difficult tasksAble to work in a collaborative team environment to obtain best resultsAbility to delegate work, set clear direction, and manage workflowAbility to effectively give feedback, provide guidance or corrective action, coach, and develop employee skillsetsRegards!Pavan KumarSenior Technical RecruiterWISE EQUATION SOLUTION INC(Service-Disabled Veteran-Owned Company)Address: 3000 Polar lane Suite 903Cedar Park TX 78613Office No: +1 512 768 5201 Ext-216Email: Pavan.k@wiseq.net
